title: Lynda.com Up and Running with MATLAB-ELOHiM - [ATOM]
description:
Lynda.com Up and Running with MATLAB-ELOHiM

RELEASE DATE....: 2014-06-09
RELEASE SIZE....: 8x15Mb
FORMAT..........: Bookware
LANGUAGE........: English
URL.............: http://www.lynda.com

MATLAB is one of the most popular programming languages today for
engineers and scientists, and with good reason.it allows data analysts to
work efficiently with large amounts of data. Let author Patrick Royal show
you how to harness the MATLAB tools and gain a level of fluency with the
language. He shows how to work with the core syntax, which is
significantly different than other programming languages; create scripts
and functions; debug your program; and finally, work with plots,
annotations, and images. The final chapter covers external
toolboxes.extensions and libraries that automate, complement, and enhance
existing MATLAB functionality.

Topics include:
* Installing MATLAB
* Working with MATLAB variables
* Working with matrix and scalar operations
* Creating functions
* Understanding performance considerations
* Building basic plots
* Creating responsive programs
* Editing variables manually
* Working with the Statistics Toolbox

Author: Patrick Royal
Subject: Developer, Desktop Apps, Programming Languages
Software: MATLAB
Level: Intermediate
Duration: 1h 30m
Released: Jun 12, 2013
